Name: SCT001 - email to SCT officer if call goes in red
Output_template:
{"subject":"{process_name} - {case_ref} about to reach its SLA","fromName":"{NoReplyEmail_N} ","from":"{NoReplyEmail}","recipients_to":"{assignedUser3}","recipients_cc":"","recipients_bcc":"","pdf_attachments":"5ca219e2aa107","body":"
Hello,

The {process_name} form - reference {case_ref} - which has been assigned to you is about to reach its SLA, please check Dash.

If you don't have access to Dash but are out patrolling and can pick up this call, please make sure you close the call in Dash when you return to the office.

Address reported: {addressReport1}

Yours sincerely,

Portsmouth City Council
